title: Returning stuff
body: So I got Project Ashe for my birthday and after the few months I had it I'm not really happy with the skin and I already used my 3 return token for something (I was stupid and I didn't know I can only have 3 for each account) so my question is can I return the skin in anywaywhile still getting 1820 to back? I really want the rp back so I can get forecast Janna and idk if there's another way to return the skin so I can get it. Plz send msg asap ty

replies.body:
Damn, I'm sorry to hear you didn't end up enjoying PROJECT: Ashe. :(

Unfortunately, there's no other way to refund this purchase without additional refund tokens. Those tokens are the only exception to our [*no refund policy*](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ).

If you have any other questions, let me know.

For any of the project skins will there be an event so people who got the project skin be able to get the project boarder because even though I complained about project Ashe I learned to valor my skins

I'm not aware of any plans to bring back a chance to earn those PROJECT skin borders. I think *Videorfeak* covered some great points, and overall, these borders have been a neat bonus for players that pick these skins up during their launch. I don't work on the team that plans sales, promotions, or crafting events, so I can't give you a direct answer. You can find any sales announcements on the [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/).

If you have any other questions, let me know.

>
> For any of the project skins will there be an event so people who got the project skin be able to get the project boarder because even though I complained about project Ashe I learned to valor my skins

The project boarders were made soecificaaly for people who got the skins when they first came out, and in some cases auch as project first strike people who got the boarder paid more for the skins than people who did not get the boarder and got the skins cheaper. So to answer your question, the boarders were made with the intent to be a limited time thing and never return, if they did then Riot would need to comp everyone who already owns them by giving them something exclusive in return other than just extra rp; therefore 99.99% sure they will never be re-released.
